column3: utACK 508b65c less code is bettter code
TBH I like the explicit construction more, this change seems completely unnecessary
oh I see, it's not a pointer, ok fine, yes then it's not sensible to assign nullptr\n\nwas just getting a bit annoyed with getting a "clean up" PR after every PR, sorry

Tend to agree with @laanwj. According to https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/utility/functional/function/function both variations "1-2) Creates an empty function."\nIf one variant is preferable, it should be mentioned in the developer notes.
I prefer 1) but I don't care that much.
